"Eric J. Bowman" <eric@...> writes:

> Sorry about that, again, everyone. One of these days I will be changing
> mail providers.

I hope changing mail provider also mean changing mail agent too. Your
current mail agent is not message-threading-friendly: it does not have
nor propagate any In-Reply-To or References header, nor any in lieu
value.

With this email, I also apologise if my emails ever rehash things that
have been disclaimed before because it's really is difficult to follow
the different conversation threads manually.


YS.
